thread.title: Novogen to review its pre-clinical trials
thread.title_full: Novogen to review its pre-clinical trials | afr.com

author: afr.com
title: Novogen to review its pre-clinical trials
text:
Novogen has launched a company-wide review. Novogen The acting chief executive of cancer researcher Novogen has launched a company-wide review that could impact some of its projects.
Iain Ross was last week appointed to run the company after former chief executive and founder Graham Kelly resigned to pursue his own research.
Mr Ross on Thursday said Novogen will immediately review its pre-clinical programs in detail.
"Whilst not wanting to pre-empt the outcome of the review I anticipate we may have to re-prioritise some of the programs," he said.
Novogen has two cancer drugs in development that it aims to progress to clinical trials in 2016, and a third that could be progress to human trials in 2016/17.
AAP dmc/bt
